entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
